name: 孫殷同
objective: Introduction to state-of-the-art lean manufacturing systems and practical skills. Tentative topics include: 1. lean principles; 2. value stream mapping synergy; 3. continuous improvement by single minute exchange of die; 4. internet of things applications; 5. theory of constraints and etc.
schedule:
(Tentative schedule)
1~2:  Lean principles
3~4:  Value stream mapping technology 
5~8:  Lean implementation in realistic machining processes  
9:  Midterm Test
10~16:  Lean implementation in virtual assembling processes
17:  Final project
18:  Final Test
scorePolicy:
Notebook computer for in-class activities
There is a grade point deduction from the overall grade for late submission of work.
Homework 20%
Tests 20%
Term project 35%
Participation 25%
